creature

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • creature.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Creatures

    public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
implements Creatures
    The representation of the user in the game.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      Player(Creature creature)
      Create a player from a given creature

      • getStats

        public java.lang.String[] getStats()
        Get player stats as array of String. The array has the following structure: 0: name of player 1: his current HP 2: his current level 3: name of the equipped weapon 4: collected amount of gold 5: number of gone steps
        Returns:
        String array of fixed length with 6 entries.
